item.title: University of Waterloo Course Dependencies
item.description: Introduction I ported York University’s course dependency visualizer to courses offered by the faculty of mathematics of the University of Waterloo. It is still a work in progress but hopefully I would be able to polish it further and add support for other faculties in near future.. Python codes used to scrape the data from course calendar and generate html files are hosted in this repository. Departments AMATH CO CS
